attributes.action: A revision into the selling of video games.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the laws regarding selling video games to underage people should be tightened to include the people who buy video games for underage people, for instance it should be just as illegal to sell a game to someone whom yopu suspect is going to then give that game to a minor.  This is because i have know many people to buy an 18 rated game for someone who is around ten years old.
